book-item.author: Gambardella, Matthew
book-item.description: An in-depth look at creating applications with XML.

book-item.author: Ralls, Kim
book-item.description: A former architect battles corporate zombies, an evil sorceress, and her own childhood to become queen of the world.

book-item.author: Corets, Eva
book-item.description: After the collapse of a nanotechnology society in England, the young survivors lay the foundation for a new society.

book-item.author: Corets, Eva
book-item.description: In post-apocalypse England, the mysterious agent known only as Oberon helps to create a new life for the inhabitants of London. Sequel to Maeve Ascendant.

book-item.author: Corets, Eva
book-item.description: The two daughters of Maeve, half-sisters, battle one another for control of England. Sequel to Oberon's Legacy.

book-item.author: Randall, Cynthia
book-item.description: When Carla meets Paul at an ornithology conference, tempers fly as feathers get ruffled.

book-item.author: Thurman, Paula
book-item.description: A deep sea diver finds true love twenty thousand leagues beneath the sea.

book-item.author: Knorr, Stefan
book-item.description: An anthology of horror stories about roaches, centipedes, scorpions and other insects.

book-item.author: Kress, Peter
book-item.description: After an inadvertant trip through a Heisenberg Uncertainty Device, James Salway discovers the problems of being quantum.

book-item.author: O'Brien, Tim
book-item.description: Microsoft's .NET initiative is explored in detail in this deep programmer's reference.

book-item.author: O'Brien, Tim
book-item.description: The Microsoft MSXML3 parser is covered in detail, with attention to XML DOM interfaces, XSLT processing, SAX and more.

book-item.author: Galos, Mike
book-item.description: Microsoft Visual Studio 7 is explored in depth, looking at how Visual Basic, Visual C++, C#, and ASP+ are integrated into a comprehensive development environment.
